statements: SELECT * FROM top_performing_stocks;
SELECT stock_symbol, company_name, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks;
SELECT company_name, sector FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE market_cap > 1000000 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT company_name, sector, market_cap FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY market_cap DESC, performance_score DESC;
SELECT company_name, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks;
SELECT sector, market_cap, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE sector = 'Technology' AND market_cap > 1000000;
SELECT company_name, market_cap FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score > 9 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT sector, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_performance FROM top_performing_stocks GROUP BY sector ORDER BY avg_performance DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_name, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT closing_price, performance_date, stock_id FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT stock_name, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score < 50 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_symbol, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score >= 70 ORDER BY stock_name ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, performance_date, closing_price FROM historical_performance_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price DESC, performance_date ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_name, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_name, performance_score FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY stock_name ASC
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_name, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM top_performing_stocks GROUP BY stock_symbol ORDER BY avg_score DESC

SELECT hpd.stock_id, hpd.performance_date, hpd.closing_price, tps.stock_name FROM historical_performance_data hpd LEFT JOIN top_performing_stocks tps ON hpd.stock_id = tps.stock_id WHERE hpd.closing_price > 100 ORDER BY hpd.performance_date DESC

SELECT stock_symbol, stock_name, performance_score, CASE WHEN performance_score > 90 THEN 'High Performer' ELSE 'Normal Performer' END AS performance_level FROM top_performing_stocks ORDER BY performance_level ASC
SELECT * FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_id ASC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE stock_price < 100 ORDER BY stock_price ASC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_performance FROM stocks WHERE stock_performance >= 1 ORDER BY stock_performance DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, stock_performance FROM stocks WHERE stock_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY stock_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_performance FROM stocks WHERE stock_performance BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7 ORDER BY stock_performance ASC;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, stock_price, stock_performance FROM stocks WHERE stock_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY stock_id;
SELECT * FROM stock_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01' ORDER BY date DESC, high_price ASC;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, MAX(stock_price) AS max_price, MIN(stock_price) AS min_price FROM stocks GROUP BY stock_id, stock_name HAVING COUNT(stock_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Stock;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name FROM Stock WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_name FROM Stock ORDER BY stock_symbol DESC;
SELECT performance_date, performance_value FROM StockPerformance WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT ranking_position, ranking_date FROM StockRanking WHERE stock_id = 2 ORDER BY ranking_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Stock;
SELECT stock_name, stock_symbol FROM Stock WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT stock_name, COUNT(*) AS total_performances FROM Stock JOIN StockPerformance ON Stock.stock_id = StockPerformance.stock_id GROUP BY stock_name;
SELECT stock_name, MAX(performance_value) AS max_performance FROM Stock JOIN StockPerformance ON Stock.stock_id = StockPerformance.stock_id GROUP BY stock_name;
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM StockView WHERE stock_id IN (SELECT stock_id FROM Stock WHERE stock_symbol LIKE 'AAPL%');
SELECT name, symbol, price, volume FROM stocks;
SELECT * FROM stock_performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_id, date, open_price, high_price, low_price FROM historical_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT stock_id, rating, rating_date FROM stock_ratings ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT stock_id, rank, performance_date, closing_price, daily_return FROM stock_view WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT name, price, volume FROM stocks WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date = '2022-06-30' AND volume > 100000 ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT s.name, s.symbol, sp.closing_price FROM stocks s JOIN stock_performance sp ON s.id = sp.stock_id WHERE sp.performance_date = '2022-07-01' ORDER BY sp.closing_price DESC
SELECT st.name, sr.rating, sr.rating_date FROM stocks st JOIN stock_ratings sr ON st.id = sr.stock_id WHERE sr.rating > 4 ORDER BY sr.rating_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sv.stock_id, sv.rank, s.name, sv.closing_price, sv.daily_return FROM stock_view sv JOIN stocks s ON s.id = sv.stock_id ORDER BY sv.rank ASC
